text:
MANYPIXELS.co | Software Engineer | REMOTE or Jakarta, Indonesia | https://www.manypixels.co

Manypixels is a managed, on-demand marketplace for premium design services. With a team in Indonesia, we bridge the gap between design talents in developing countries and SME's in developed countries through innovation in technology.

- We started from scratch 12 months ago and recently hit $50,000 in MRR.

- We are building one of the most incredible platform to order design services.

- We are profitable.

We are a team of two developers (Cofounder/CTO + 1 other Software engineer) and 40+ design staff located in two offices in Indonesia (Jakarta and Yogyakarta).

If you'd like to work with us, send us the work you've done + your Github profile to robin@manypixels.co

Cheers.
